segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflow is going unnoticed, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's damaging the wood, I can imagine the cost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure might end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is precarious; a fall would hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's just a kid wanting cookies, innocent really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mom won't even know until it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside makes it sadder somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the family; accidents like this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish I could warn them without scaring the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn a happy home upside down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor little ones, playing in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
